roleset.name: make rough
roleset.note: ROUGHEN-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from roughen.01-v)

example.name: Active
example.text: We roughened the surfaces with sandpaper.

roleset.name: commit violence on, rough_up: manhandled, battered
roleset.note: ROUGH_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rough up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from rough.01-v predicate notes)
ROUGH_UP-J NOTES: Added by Julia for consistency with rough-v.01. (from rough.01-j)

example.name: passive
example.text: Last week [the stock]-1 hit an all-time high of 37 1/4 before *trace*-1 getting roughed *trace*-1 up in the Friday-the-13th minicrash.

example.name: arg1, LOC, MNR
example.text: the glue sticks better if the surface is roughed up around the hole with sand paper...

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: But at the end of the sitting , when Michelangelo showed him the quick , free drawings , with the mother roughed in , holding her son , the model grasped what Michelangelo was after [*T*-1] , and promised [*-2]to speak to his friends .

roleset.name: bumpy, coarse, unrefined
roleset.note: ROUGH-J NOTES: Added by Julia. Relation to roughen.01. (from rough.03-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The draft is rough but it is the seed of the final manuscript that emerges after one or two revisions.

example.name: arg1
example.text: A cat's tongue is rough because it's covered with many tiny, hooked 'papillae'.
example.arg: because it's covered with many tiny, hooked "papillae"

roleset.name: difficult, harsh
roleset.note: ROUGH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. (from rough.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The issue with your sister is rough .
